language.description: Adds a customizable banner at the top of category indexes.

background.caption: Background image
background.info:
Specify a background image for the banner. Suggested dimensions: 900x200px. It will be resized to fit the contents while keeping its aspect ratio.
Note: If you specify an image, the text inside the banner will be changed to white with black shadow to improve visibility.

title.caption: Extended title
title.info: You can override the category title on the banner. If empty, the actual category title will be used.

description.caption: Extended description
description.info:
Specify a full description to be shown on the banner. If empty, the default description will be rendered.
Yoy may use any HTML markup as needed.
